body.p: June-2003: Mark Utting et. al. presented an XML schema for Z at the ZB2003 conference in Turku, Finland, based on the DTD by Ian Toyn.
Jan-2002: Ian Toyn designed an XML DTD for Z, based on the abstract syntaxes of CadiZ, Zeta and the ISO Z standard.
Sept-2001: Andrew Martin proposed the CZT project.
